医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人工智能预测舌头疾病的准确率高达 96%一种利用机器学习来预测舌头疾病的新颖系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Artificial-intelligence-predicts-tongue-disease-with-96-percent-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Artificial-intelligence-predicts-tongue-disease-with-96-percent-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a3a51a9-d401-4cd8-898d-527dbba01896 Thu, 15 Aug 2024 07:53:00 -0400 Artificial intelligence predicts tongue disease with 96 percent accuracy
研究人员揭示了为什么富含镁的饮食对您的健康如此重要研究人员检查了澳大利亚健康中年人群的镁缺乏是否与体内 DNA 损伤相关的同型半胱氨酸水平升高独立存在或同时存在。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Researchers-reveal-why-a-diet-rich-in-magnesium-is-so-important-for-your-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Researchers-reveal-why-a-diet-rich-in-magnesium-is-so-important-for-your-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9652ea06-68b2-48c4-a38c-b811c13b2216 Thu, 15 Aug 2024 07:39:00 -0400 Researchers reveal why a diet rich in magnesium is so important for your health
抗炎饮食可以降低患有心脏代谢疾病的老年人患痴呆症的风险研究人员调查了抗炎饮食是否支持心脏代谢疾病（CMD）患者的认知功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Anti-lingual-diets-could-lower-dementia-risk-among-older-individuals-with-cardiometabolic-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Anti-lingual-diets-could-lower-dementia-risk-among-older-individuals-with-cardiometabolic-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53635d7d-f186-43ea-81b7-8fc5794feb90 Thu, 15 Aug 2024 06:51:00 -0400 Anti-inflammatory diets could lower dementia risk among older individuals with cardiometabolic disorders
新研究给出了结直肠癌基因组成的前所未有的观点研究人员通过对 2,023 个样本进行全基因组测序，确定了新的驱动基因、分子亚群和潜在的临床意义，提供了结直肠癌（一种始于结肠或直肠的癌症）的全面基因组特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/New-research-gives-unprecedented-view-of-colorectal-cancer-genic-makeup.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/New-research-gives-unprecedented-view-of-colorectal-cancer-genic-makeup.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1fef0b9c-7402-48d7-9d3d-5f36263e90d0 Thu, 15 Aug 2024 04:41:00 -0400 New research gives unprecedented view of colorectal cancer genetic makeup
英国儿童肺炎病例异常激增，与肺炎支原体有关研究表明，2023-24 年冬季，英格兰儿童中与肺炎相关的紧急就诊次数显着且持续增加，这主要是由肺炎支原体感染所致。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Unusual-surge-in-childrens-pneumonia-cases-in-England-linked-to-Mycoplasma-pneumoniae.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Unusual-surge-in-childrens-pneumonia-cases-in-England-linked-to-Mycoplasma-pneumoniae.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8646ff1-fb23-41ba-be1a-f0feb0e9f827 Thu, 15 Aug 2024 00:29:00 -0400 Unusual surge in children's pneumonia cases in England linked to Mycoplasma pneumoniae
研究表明蚊子是澳大利亚布鲁里溃疡的潜在媒介研究人员发现强有力的证据表明蚊子可能传播溃疡分枝杆菌，这种细菌会引起布鲁里溃疡，但需要进一步研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Study-suggests-mosquitoes-as-pottial-vectors-for-Buruli-ulcers-in-Australia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Study-suggests-mosquitoes-as-pottial-vectors-for-Buruli-ulcers-in-Australia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=824b3d42-cb7c-48b0-afb8-76e0777d127a Thu, 15 Aug 2024 00:02:00 -0400 Study suggests mosquitoes as potential vectors for Buruli ulcers in Australia
研究显示，母亲心率变异性与产后心理健康和婴儿大脑发育有关研究人员发现，产后较低的母亲心率变异性与较高的焦虑和抑郁有关，影响母亲和婴儿的神经生理学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Maternal-heart-rate-variability-tied-to-postpartum-mental-health-and-infant-brain-development-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Maternal-heart-rate-variability-tied-to-postpartum-mental-health-and-infant-brain-development-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d24363e-f6b1-4ea4-b984-e7e59612f885 Wed, 14 Aug 2024 23:27:00 -0400 Maternal heart rate variability tied to postpartum mental health and infant brain development, study reveals
美国研究称咖啡可能对低肌肉质量患者有益较高的咖啡和咖啡因摄入量与骨骼肌质量增加有关，但这种关联在 BMI 为 30 kg/m² 或更高的个体中消失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Coffee-may-benefit-患者-with-low-muscle-mass-says-US-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Coffee-may-benefit-患者-with-low-muscle-mass-says-US-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62ab5768-be6c-4f7a-8ddb-8e0cd6a453a2 Wed, 14 Aug 2024 22:57:00 -0400 Coffee may benefit patients with low muscle mass, says U.S. study
脑部扫描可以检测一些反应迟钝的患者的意识由麻省总医院专家共同领导的一项新研究发现，脑部扫描可以检测一些反应迟钝的脑损伤患者的意识。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Brain-scans-can-detect-thought-in-some-unresponsive-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Brain-scans-can-detect-thought-in-some-unresponsive-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cba31279-05e1-45ce-bdac-9de0f3df73ff Wed, 14 Aug 2024 21:12:23 -0400 Brain scans can detect consciousness in some unresponsive patients
未经治疗的高血压与老年人患阿尔茨海默病的风险较高有关与已经或正在接受高血压治疗的人和没有慢性病的人相比，60 岁及以上患有未经治疗的高血压的人患阿尔茨海默病的风险可能会增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Untreatment-high-blood-Pressure-linked-to-higher-Alzheimers-risk-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Untreatment-high-blood-Pressure-linked-to-higher-Alzheimers-risk-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=401e0169-9838-45bb-9245-deeac44be930 Wed, 14 Aug 2024 21:06:33 -0400 Untreated high blood pressure linked to higher Alzheimer's risk in older adults
